definition: lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
variant of 拖[tuo1]
mud/clay/paste/pulp
restrained
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: He never procrastinates , but always takes resolute measures to solve a complicated problem in an instant.
sentences.chinese: 他干什么事总是快刀斩乱麻，从不拖泥带水。

sentences.english: Draggy sales are attributed to a psychology of caution.
sentences.chinese: 拖泥带水的销售归咎于谨慎的心理。

sentences.english: The loathsome love, also is only left over inexhaustible moved finally.
sentences.chinese: 拖泥带水的爱，最后也只剩下无尽的伤感。

sentences.english: The class is god-given below today not messy, basic and punctual excellent.
sentences.chinese: 今天下班难得的不拖泥带水，基本准时到家。

sentences.english: Eclipses call for final decisions, with no delaying the answer.
sentences.chinese: 星蚀毫无疑问是会带来最终答案的，绝不拖泥带水。

sentences.english: Given the extent of the cuts and transpositions , there could be no lingering over the development of character.
sentences.chinese: 因如此程度的浓缩和换位，角色的深入毫不拖泥带水。

definition: see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
squeaky clean/neat and tidy/efficient
firm/unwavering
dilatory/sluggish/muddled/roundabout
lit. quick sword cuts through tangled hemp (idiom); decisive action in a complex situation/cutting the Gordian knot
agile/nimble/all settled/in order
to procrastinate
to make a decision when it's time to decide
indecisive/irresolute
to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
efficient/brisk/neat
nimble
going directly (without detour)/(fig.) direct/straightforward (in one's manner or speech)
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to leave room to maneuver/to leave a margin for error
